title: Coverage
description: Insurance or medical plan or a payment agreement.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:type.title: Type
fhir:type.description: Coverage category such as medical or accident.

fhir:policyHolder.title: Policy Holder
fhir:policyHolder.description: The party who 'owns' the insurance policy.

fhir:subscriber.title: Subscriber
fhir:subscriber.description: The party who has signed-up for or 'owns' the contractual relationship to the policy or to whom the benefit of the policy for services rendered to them or their family is due..

fhir:subscriberId.title: Subscriber Identifier
fhir:subscriberId.description: The insurer assigned ID for the Subscriber.

fhir:beneficiary.title: Plan Beneficiary
fhir:beneficiary.description: The party who benefits from the insurance coverage; the patient when products and/or services are provided.

fhir:dependent.title: Dependent number
fhir:dependent.description: A designator for a dependent under the coverage.

fhir:relationship.title: Beneficiary Relationship
fhir:relationship.description: The relationship of beneficiary (patient) to the subscriber.

fhir:period.title: Coverage start and end dates.
fhir:period.description: Time period during which the coverage is in force. A missing start date indicates the start date isn't known, a missing end date means the coverage is continuing to be in force..

fhir:insurer.title: Insurer
fhir:insurer.description: The program or plan underwriter, payor, insurance company.

fhir:class.title: Class
fhir:class.description: A suite of underwriter specific classifiers.

xdm:ype.title: Type
xdm:ype.description: Type of class such as 'group' or 'plan'.

xdm:value.title: Value
xdm:value.description: The alphanumeric identifier associated with the insurer issued label.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: Human readable description of the type and value.

fhir:network.title: Insurer Network
fhir:network.description: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' terms and conditions apply.

fhir:costToBeneficiary.title: Cost To Beneficiary
fhir:costToBeneficiary.description: A suite of codes indicating the cost category and associated amount which have been detailed in the policy and may have been included on the health card..

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The category of patient centric costs associated with treatment..

xdm:category.title: Category
xdm:category.description: Code to identify the general type of benefits under which products and services are provided..

xdm:network.title: Network
xdm:network.description: Is a flag to indicate whether the benefits refer to in-network providers or out-of-network providers.

xdm:unit.title: Unit
xdm:unit.description: Indicates if the benefits apply to an individual or to the family.

xdm:term.title: Term
xdm:term.description: The term or period of the values such as 'maximum lifetime benefit' or 'maximum annual visits'.

xdm:valueQuantity.title: Value Quantity
xdm:valueQuantity.description: The Quantity due from the patient for the cost category.

xdm:valueMoney.title: Value Money
xdm:valueMoney.description: The amount due from the patient for the cost category.

xdm:exception.title: Exception
xdm:exception.description: A suite of codes indicating exceptions or reductions to patient costs and their effective periods.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: The code for the specific exception..

xdm:period.title: Period
xdm:period.description: The effective period of the exception.

fhir:contract.title: Contract Details
fhir:contract.description: The policy(s) which constitute this insurance coverage.

fhir:insurancePlan.title: Insurance Plan
fhir:insurancePlan.description: The insurance plan details, benefits and costs, which constitute this insurance coverage.
